snippet: The man, who the police said accidentally flew the drone into the famed skyscraper, was arrested on Thursday after asking security guards for help retrieving the device from a ledge on the 36th floor.
abstract: New York City police arrest Sean Riddle of New Jersey after he accidentally flies drone into Empire State Building; is charged with form of reckless endangerment specific to cases involving aircraft.
lead_paragraph: The man, who the police said accidentally flew the drone into the famed skyscraper, was arrested on Thursday after asking security guards for help retrieving the device from a ledge on the 36th floor.

headline.main: New Jersey Man Is Arrested After Drone Hits Empire State Building
headline.print_headline: Man Is Arrested After Drone Hits Famed Skyscraper
